Text: Ngh...!

Incredible...! She's holding her own better than the
other day!
Yeah...but the difference in power is plain to see!
Beta! Zeta! I'm fine... Don't try to help!
But why?!
Then why prepare all those coordinated maneuvers?!

...I'm on the cusp of understanding something!
A breakthrough courtesy of her blade—Olivier's
blade!

A breakthrough?! Regarding what?! She's been a blank
slate this entire time, not even making a sound—

What you say is true, Zeta. This Olivier is like a
puppet.
But...even so...I understand.

Perhaps it's due to the swordsmanship I learned from
Shadow allowing me to "converse" with her...

Or perhaps it's because of her blood...the blood of
the hero...that flows fiercely through my veins!
...Tell me, Olivier!
Why are you here?!

Why do you and I share the same face?! What fate have
you entrusted me with?!

If possession is a blessing and not a curse, then
what exactly is this blessing?!
*gasp*
Maybe this means she can't speak...?
Lady Alpha...!
No... My blade received her message.
Olivier...is here of her own will.
I don't as yet know what happened in her past...

But she placed her faith in something...and made the
choice to stay here!
Lady Alpha!
Stay back!

Don't worry. She won't turn her blade against those
who don't approach the innermost depths.

And...so long as the person is worthy, you'll let
them pass. You'll show us the secret of this place,
this Sanctuary—

The hero's blood within me tells me the truth of
this!
...Am I not correct, Olivier?!

She responded! Even though she'd ignored everything
else so far!

The hero... Olivier! Could Lili be in some
Sanctuary somewhere, too?

Thank you, Olivier. Thank you for answering my blade,
my intentions.
...Let's go, Beta, Zeta.

When we next visit here, it will be because the time
is ripe for us to learn the Sanctuary's secret—

...In other words! Lady Alpha...might be a direct
descendant of the Three Heroes!
Oh really...

She always had that kind of feel to her! Not that I
don't come from pretty good stock myself!
Wow...

(The setup of Alpha actually being a hero all along
was really starting to pick up steam—)

(But I never thought she'd finally bust out the
"Truth is, I've got a hero's blood in me" move now!)

(I mean, yeah, everyone has moments where they think
that. Like wondering if they're actually born under a
fateful star!)

(...But the Shadow Garden is nothing more than part
of the setting, as is our fight with the Cult of Diablos.)

(Alpha at the very least is kind enough to play along
with my shadowbroker game in full understanding of
all that...)

Basically...this is an unspoken challenge on her
part!
A challenge?!
Yeah, a challenge.

A challenge saying that we can push what we do in
the Shadow Garden to the next level!

(In a nutshell, she's taunting me, saying I can do an
even better job of being "Cid"!)

So...does this mean we'll be refining the Garden even
more through challenging the secret of the heroes?!

Hmm... Alpha is not one for compromise. I think we
can assume this is her gaining new awareness of her
position and role.

Amazing... So, Lady Alpha made the revision plan with
such grand, complex intentions?!
...In that case, I really have to step up my game!
O-Okay...

I'm going to work even harder to strive toward
my ideal self, regardless of birth, ancestry,
or physique!
Good, that's why you're Epsilo—Um? Physique?
Ahaha, oh, um, never mind that last bit! Ahahaha!
Oh, okay, ahahaha!

(Alpha pumps up the setting, and Epsilon pumps up her
slime. A true Shadow Garden revision plan!)
